name: Logitech Z50 - Speaker - for portable use - 5-watt - gray | Dell USA
description: Large for a small speaker, the 2.25-inch driver produces 10 W of peak power for a surprisingly loud sound. The mini speaker is compact and portable, giving you the freedom to play your favorite multimedia around the home. It uses an AC power supply, so there is no need to ever recharge your Z50. Designed for Plug and Play simplicity, just connect the Logitech Z50 to your smartphone, tablet or laptop.
